Action.author: lbendixsen
Action.body: FoundationBuilder.tgz contains the FoundationBuilder.log file up to the time it was uploaded (~Friday, Mar 22 11AM MST).Â Danube.tar was the first log file from Danube and danube-2.tar (which probably also contains what was in danube.tar) was collected Mar 21 at about 4pm mountain time. Please let me know what other logs you might need.
